_sText:
**This is an old map I made in February 2011**
====================

I never uploaded it on gamebanana (fpsbanana)
so I decided to upload it now :).
Most Skill Surfer will already know this one
if there is someone out there who don´t, let me say
the lightning wasn´t very well made, will do it better in my next map :)
This is the nojail Version theres another one with one in it.


**How to install the Map:**
===========================

Download the map unpack, go to your steam folder and put it like the following:

\Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps


How to surf offline:
====================

-right click on your steam logo in your taskbar

-choose library

-right click Counter Strike: Source

-click properties

-Generally then specify start options

-type in -tickrate 66 -console


After this the console will open when you start the game,
Now you can type in the surf settings:
================================================================================================


sv_airaccelerate 150

sv_enablebunnyhopping 1
